thread.title: James Harden is really, really happy to see Yao Ming
thread.title_full: James Harden is really, really happy to see Yao Ming

author: Joe Rivera (Joseph.Rivera@performgroup.com)
title: James Harden is really, really happy to see Yao Ming
text:
February 3, 2017 10:12pm   10:09pm EST Apparently, Harden is Yao's No. 1 fan. (Getty Images) 
Updated at 10:12 p.m. ET 
Updated at 10:12 p.m. ET 
The last few months have certainly been great for Yao Ming. First, he gets enshrined in the Basketball Hall of Fame in September. Then, the Rockets retire his number. Now, he gets to meet his — apparent — No. 1 fan: James Harden. 
On the night the Rockets retired his number, the 7-6 Ming got to mingle with some current Rockets players just after getting his jersey retired. 
Among those players was the potential NBA MVP and the current, bearded face of the franchise — who was more than happy to see the former Rockets center.
